mapper.insert: insert into recent_week (agent_id, datetime, name, type, last_value, min_value, max_value, updated) values(#{agentId}, #{datetime}, #{name}, #{type}, #{value}, 0.0, 0.0, now())
mapper.select: select agent_id, datetime, name, type, last_value as value, --last_value, --min_value, --max_value, --updated from recent_week where agent_id = #{agentId} and name = #{name} and datetime = #{datetime}
